import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Card, Button, CardDeck } from "react-bootstrap"; import CloudUploadIcon from "@material-ui/icons/CloudUpload"; // import { FilePond } from 'react-filepond'; import "filepond/dist/filepond.min.css"; import axios from "axios"; import { FileService } from '../services/file-service.jsx'; class Cards extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.fileService = new FileService(); this.state={downloading:false}; } extractFileName = (contentDispositionValue) => { var filename = ""; if (contentDispositionValue && contentDispositionValue.indexOf('attachment') !== -1) { var filenameRegex = /filename[^;=\n]*=((['"]).*?\2|[^;\n]*)/; var matches = filenameRegex.exec(contentDispositionValue); if (matches != null && matches[1]) { filename = matches[1].replace(/['"]/g, ''); } } return filename; } handleselectedFile = event => { this.setState({ selectedFile: event.target.files[0], file: document.getElementById(), loaded: 100 }); }; handleUpload = event => { event.preventDefault(); console.log("uploaded"); let data = new FormData(); data.append("file", this.state.selectedFile, this.state.selectedFile.name); data.append("name", this.state.selectedFile.name); axios .post("http://192.168.1.20:5000/upload", data, { onUploadProgress: ProgressEvent => { this.setState({ loaded: (ProgressEvent.loaded / ProgressEvent.total) * 100 }); } }) .then(res => { console.log(res.statusText); }); }; state = {}; render() { return (
